column2: "Dɛm nokwardzi na dwuma pa a Hezekia na ɔman no dzii yi ekyir no
column3: Asiriahen Senakerib bae na ɔbɛhɛɛn Juda
column4: na ɔkyeer nsera wɔ kurow a wɔabobɔ ho ban no do
column5: na ɔdween dɛ ɔbɛgye ama noho."

column2: "Na aber a Hezekia hun dɛ Senakerib aba
column3: na oesua dɛ ɔnye Jerusalɛm robɔko no
column5: "nna ɔnye ne mbapɔmba na ne mbarimba akatakyi faa apam dɛ wobesiw nsunyiwa a ɔwowɔ kurow no ekyir no; na wɔboaa no."

column2: "Nna nkorɔfo pii behyiae
column3: na wosisiiw nsunyiwa no nyinara
column4: na ɔwora no a ɔpem da asaase no ne finimfin no
column6: Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na Asiria ahemfo bɛba ebohu nsu pii?"

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ dzen
column3: na ɔtoow fasu a ebubu no nyinara
column4: na ɔmaa do kodur aban atsentsen no ho
column5: na fasu fofor so wɔ kurow no ekyir
column6: na ɔhyɛɛ Millo dzen wɔ David kurow mu
column7: na ɔyeyɛɛ akodze na akyɛm piigyan."

column2: "Na ɔdze ɔsa mu asafohemfo sisii ɔman no do
column3: na ɔpoon hɔn behyiaa ne nkyɛn wɔ kurow no no kuropon ano gua no do
column4: na ɔkasaa akomatɔmu mu kyerɛɛ hɔn
column7: "Hom nhyɛ homho dzen na hom nya akokodur
column8: mma hom nsuro na eso hom abaw mu nntu wɔ Asiriahen no
column9: na eso nyimpadodow a wɔka no ho no ntsi: osiandɛ nyia ɔwɔ hɛn nkyɛn no yɛ ɔkɛse sen nyia ɔka no ho."

column2: "Ɔno dze honam abasa na ɔnye no wɔ hɔ; na hɛn dze
column3: hɛn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔnye hɔn wɔ hɔ dɛ ɔbɔboa hɛn
column4: na ɔaako hɛn ko ama hɛn. Nna ɔman no dze hɔnho tweer Judahen Hezekia ne nsɛm no."

column2: "Iyi ekyir no Asiriahen Senakerib somaa no nkowaa ma wɔbaa Jerusalɛm
column3: (afei nna ɔnoara wɔ Lakis ho
column4: na n'etumfo nyinara so ka no ho
column5: ) Judahen Hezekia na Juda nyinara a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no nkyɛn
column9: Ebɛnadze do na hom enyi da
column10: ma hom retsena ntuae yi mu wɔ Jerusalɛm yi?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ ndaadaa na Hezekia redaadaa hom
column3: ma ɔdze hom ahyɛ owu nsa wɔ ɔkɔm na nsukɔm mu
column4: dɛ
column5: Hɛn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn beyi hɛn efi Asiriahen no nsamu no bi a?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ ɔnoara Hezekia yi bi na oeyiyi ne mbea sorɔnsorɔm na n'afɔrmbukyia no
column3: na ɔahyɛ Juda na Jerusalɛm
column4: dɛ
column5: Afɔrmbukyia kor enyim na hom nsɔr
column6: na no do na hom nhyew eduhuam no bi a?"

column2: "Ana hom nnyim dza emi na m'egyanom dze ayɛ asaase do aman nyinara no? Ana asaase do amanaman hɔn enyame no nam kwan biara do tumii gyee hɔn asaase no wɔ me nsamu a?"
"Amanaman no a m'egyanom sɛɛ hɔn pasapasa no mu enyame nyinara mu woana na otumii gyee ne man fii me nsamu
column3: na hom
column4: hom Nyankopɔn no botum agye hom efi me nsamu yi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei mma hom mma Hezekia nnsisi hom
column3: na eso ɔnndaadaa hom dɛm
column4: nkyii so mma hom nngye no nndzi: osiandɛ ɔman anaa ahenman biara mu nyame biara enntum anngye ne man emmfi me nsamu
column5: na m'egyanom nsamu: na ankantam hom Nyankopɔn! Ɔno na ɔrebɛgye hom efi me nsamu anaa?"

column2: "Na no nkorɔfo no so kasaa pii dze tsiaa EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na wɔdze tsiaa n'akowaa Hezekia."
"Ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛw nwoma so dze bɛyeyaaw EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: na ɔkasaa tsiaa no
column6: Dɛ mbrɛ asaase no amanaman a wɔanngye hɔn man emmfi me nsamu no tse no
column7: mbrɛ eso Hezekia ne Nyankopɔn no renngye ne man mmfi me nsamu ara nye no."

column2: "Na wɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu wɔ Jewfo kasaa mu frɛɛ Jerusalɛm nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ fasu no do no
column3: dɛ worupuw hɔn ma wɔabɔ hu; ama wɔaagye kurow no."

column2: "Na wɔkasaa Jerusalɛm Nyankopɔn no ho
column3: tse dɛ
column4: asaase do aman enyame no a wɔyɛ nyimpa nsaano edwuma no ho."

column2: "Na ɔhen Hezekia
column3: na Amoz ne ba nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia
column4: bɔɔ mpaa wɔ iyi ntsi

column2: "Na EWURADZE somaa ɔbɔfo bi a okotwitwaa Asiriahen no ne nseraban mu mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam
column3: na mbapɔmba no
column4: na asafohemfo no nyinara. Nna Asiriahen no dze enyimguase sanee kɔr nankasa n'asaase do. Na ɔkɔr ne nyame fie no nna hɔn a wofi nankasa ne yafun mu no bi dze afona kum no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Dɛm na EWURADZE gyee Hezekia na Jerusalɛm atsefo no nkwa fii Asiriahen Senakerib
column3: na nyimpa nkaa no nyinara nsamu
column4: na ɔmaa hɔn ho tɔɔ hɔn wɔ afa beebiara."

column2: "Na dodowara dze akyɛdze brɛɛ EWURADZE wɔ Jerusalɛm
column3: na ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo brɛɛ Judahen Hezekia: ma dɛm ntsi ofitsi ber no na wohuhoor no wɔ amanaman nyinara enyi do."

column2: "Nda no mu Hezekia yaar owuyar: na ɔbɔɔ mpaa maa EWURADZE; na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no
column3: na ɔmaa no asɛnkyerɛdze."

column2: "Mbom Hezekia annhyɛ ananmu dɛ mbrɛ yie a wɔyɛe maa no no tse; na n'akoma maa noho do: dɛm ntsi ebufuw baa ɔnoara
column3: na Juda na Jerusalɛm do."

column2: "Naaso Hezekia brɛɛ noho adze wɔ n'akoma ne ntsɛn no ho
column3: ɔno na Jerusalɛm atsefo nyinara
column4: ma dɛm ntsi EWURADZE n'ebufuw no ammba hɔn do wɔ Hezekia ne nda no mu."

column2: "Na Hezekia nyaa ahonyadze na enyidzi kɛse mbordo: na ɔyɛɛ ndzekoradzebea maa dwetɛ
column3: na sika
column4: na abo a ɔsom bo

column2: "adzekoradze adan so dze maa eburow na nsa na ngo ndɔbaa; na mbowadan dze maa fiembowa ahorow nyinara
column3: na nguamban mu nguankuw."

column2: "Nkyii so ɔkyekyeer nkurow maa noho
column3: na onyaa nguankuw na anantwikuw piigyan: na Nyankopɔn maa no ahodze pii."

column2: "Na ɔnoara Hezekia yi ara so na osiiw Gihon nsu etsifi nsunyiwa no ano
column3: na ɔdze nsu no nam daadze ase tɔnn baa David kurow no n'anee afamu. Na Hezekia yɛɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ dza ɔyɛe nyinara mu."

column2: "Mbom ber Babilɔn mbapɔmba abɔfoe a wɔsomaa hɔn ma wɔkɔr ne nkyɛn dɛ wonkebisa anwanwadze a wɔyɛɛ no wɔ asaase no do no ho asɛm no bae no
column3: Nyankopɔn gyaa no dɛ ɔdze rosɔ no ahwɛ
column4: ama oeehu dza ɔwɔ n'akoma mu nyinara."

column2: "Afei Hezekia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na ne ndzeyɛɛ pa
column4: hwɛ
column5: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Amoz ne ba nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia n'enyido adzehu no mu wɔ Juda na Israel ahemfo nwoma no mu."

column2: "Na Hezekia kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ David ne mba asamandan mu afowee: na Juda na Jerusalɛm man no nyinara yɛɛ no enyidzi wɔ no wu mu. Na ne babanyin Manaasɛ dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
